required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Quality Improvement Intervention in Colonoscopy Using Artificial Intelligence
clinical_study.official_title: Quality Improvement Intervention in Colonoscopy Using Artificial Intelligence

brief_summary.textblock: Quality measures in colonoscopy are important guides for improving the quality of patient care. But quality improvement intervention is not taking place, primarily because of the inconvenience and expense. To address the difficulties above, we used artificial intelligence for quality control of colonoscopy.

primary_outcome.description: Adenoma detection rate was defined as the number of exams with findings of adenoma divided by the total number of exams.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Colonoscopists who did not received quality intervention

intervention.intervention_name: quality improvement intervention using artificial intelligence
intervention.description: Colonoscopists received performance measure monitoring and feedback

facility.name: Department of Gastroenterology, Qilu Hospital, Shandong University
